title: Wolves lead, dogs follow -- and both cooperate with humans

title_detail.value: Wolves lead, dogs follow -- and both cooperate with humans

summary: The statement is a bold one, especially as wolves have received a lot of negative attention in recent years. A recent study conducted by behavioral researchers, however, shows that dogs and wolves both work equally well with humans, albeit in different ways. The allegedly unequal brothers are thus much more similar than often assumed.
